NewMonopoly

Class CProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • NewMonopoly.Property
      • NewMonopoly.CProperty

  • class CProperty
extends Property
    Extends the Property class. Used for properties with colors
    Author:
    Unknown

    • Constructor Detail

      • CProperty

        public CProperty(java.lang.String n,
                 int p,
                 int c,
                 int o,
                 int m,
                 boolean mb,
                 java.lang.String t,
                 java.lang.String co,
                 int g,
                 int[] r)
        Constructor defining a Colored Property. Utilized superclass constructor
        Parameters:
        n - a String for the Property's name
        p - int for the Property's position
        c - int for the Property's cost
        o - int for the Property's owner (default 0)
        m - int for the cost of mortgage for Property
        mb - boolean for the Property's mortgage status. false=not mortgaged, true=mortgaged
        t - String for the type of Property
        co - String unique to Color Properties defining the color of the Property
        g - int unique to Color Properties defining the grade of the Property
        r - int[] unique to Color Properties defining the rents owed at a given grade

      • getWorth

        public int getWorth()
        Method that calculates the worth of the property and returns that value. Price to upgrade the property is halved and then multiplied by the grade If property is mortgaged, only the mortgaged value is returned
        Overrides:
        getWorth in class Property
        Returns:
        the total worth of the property
